mapper.select: SELECT , m.member_id , m.nickname , m.profile_image_url FROM friend as f JOIN member m ON (m.member_id = f.requester_id AND f.requester_id = #{memberId}) OR (m_member_id = f.addressee_id AND f.adressee_id = #{memberId}) WHERE f.status_id = ( SELECT status_id FROM status WHERE status_type = 'ACCEPTED' )

SELECT f.requester_id AS adresseeId, m.nickname, s.status_type AS status, f.requested_at FROM friend f JOIN member m ON f.requester_id = m.member_id JOIN status s ON f.status_id = s.status_id WHERE f.adressee_id = #{memberId} AND s.status_type = 'PENDING'
